resources.string: This is the home screen, in this place can be put controls for playing a file(Now Playing) by using the MEDIAPLAYER API
This is the songs screen....\n When you open this app a list of all your songs appears If you select a song to play it uses MEDIAPLAYER API to be played
This is the artists screen....\n Contains a ListView of Artists, and if you select an artist, songs of his will be shown. That could be done in same screen by using a filter Class on songs)

This is the albums screen....\n Contains a ListView of Album Covers that can be handled by using PICASSO or GLIDE LIBRARY If you select an album a list of album songs will be displayed using a Filter Class, like the artists activity.
This is the playlists screen.... Here when you open this screen a ListView of your playlists appear and can have a new Class for creating new playlists.
